src:
Big sports events today
03 Nov 2019, 18:45 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
NEW DELHI: Here are the big sports events lined up for Monday (November 4) that comprise the Deodhar Trophy final between India C and India B.

(All timings in IST)


1:15 am (Football - Serie A)

Milan vs Lazio (Lazio won 2-1)

1:30 am (Football - La Liga)

Granada vs Real Sociedad (Real Sociedad won 2-1)

8:45 am (Cricket - Deodhar Trophy)

India C vs India B, Final (India B won by 51 runs)

10:30 am (Cricket - 2nd ODI)

Pakistan Women vs Bangladesh Women
